attributes.comment:
My single daughter recently adopted a baby internationally. We're thrilled with the
baby, but the fees have really been difficult for her. It's hard enough to bring a new
baby home and adjust to diapers and formula. I'd like to request that you leave
the current fee schedule and not raise prices. My daughter wants to adopt again,
but with adoption wait times increasing, immigration fees would get very
expensive, especially if the form expires and she has to refile and pay the fees a
second time for the same adoption.
Please don't increase the fees, I'd like more internationally adopted grandchildren.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Sue Miller
